value:
$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Pain|Rgh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Zacharias!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Pain|Be...careful, Alfonse.$k$pEmbla...has me...$k$pSoon...her hold on my mind will
be complete...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Zacharias...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|It's up to you from here...$k$p$EFace_Pain|...Gra-ahhh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Embla...$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_PlainEnemy,Face|$c255,0,0,255|Die... DIE...$k$p$EFace_Cool|$c255,0,0,255|Death to Askr!$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_PlainEnemy,Face_Pain|Grah!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Z-Zacharias!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|It's all right, Sharena. What happens
next is what matters now.$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Cool|Mm... What are you scheming,
you Askrans...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Embla! Y-you—$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face|*gasp*$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|You...gave up your possession
of Zacharias?$k$p$EFace_Pain|Wh-why now?$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Smile|Why indeed... How curious...$k$pVery curious indeed, you mortals...$k$pYour kind, you fight when you
think you can win and flee
when you fear defeat...$k$pAnd you know you will die
if you face me...$k$pYet you do not flee.$k$pAlways scheming, that Askr...
How curious...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Cool|Then that means...the key?
So, you ate the fruit then?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I-I didn't—$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Anger|What...fruit?$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face|Hm-hm-hmh... There is no use
attempting to hide your intention
from me.$k$pI spent centuries learning
about Askr's abilities...watching,
studying...in secret.$k$p$EFace_Smile|I see. So that is how you planned
to rid yourselves of me!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Smile|Such shallow thinking, you mortals.
You expected to deceive a god? Hah!$k$pAnd now, with your plan exposed,
you cannot win.$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Pain|Embla's...paranoia...is our ruin...$k$pUrk!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Zacharias! We have no choice.
You need to be healed by the key!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Pain|N-no... Embla has left my body.$k$pIf we use it now, it will be a waste.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We have a better chance with you
than without! Ash, please!$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-yes, of course! I will play my part.$k$p$EFace_Cool|Key of Yggdrasill, open the way.$k$pOpen walls that enclose! Open the
gate from which freedom flows!$k$p$Sbs3000|$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1500,255,255,255,255|$Fi1500|$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Smile|Oh, so that's the spell Askr told
you to use? Worthless...$k$pMy contempt cannot be turned
aside so easily.$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE14_14,0|$EFace_Cool|By Embla's will, close the way.$k$pClose the sky. Close the stone.
Close it all. Become...alone.$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo2000,255,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Pain|$Fi2000|Grah! GYAHHH!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What's wrong?!$k$p$WmMPID_エンブラ,ch00_43_Embla_Normal,Face_Smile|Hm-hm-hmh...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Zacharias's wounds...aren't healing!$k$pEmbla's spell has— N-no!
Zacharias, no!$k$p$WmMPID_ブルーノ皇子,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Plain,Face_Pain|Al...fonse...$k$p$Sbs150|
